thread.title: The Latest: Kardashian, brothel owner spar over Odom media
thread.title_full: The Latest: Kardashian, brothel owner spar over Odom media - US News

author: USNews
title: The Latest: Kardashian, brothel owner spar over Odom media
text:
The Latest: Khloe Kardashian, brothel owner spar over media frenzy surrounding Lamar Odom FILE - In this April 24, 2007, file photo, Los Angeles Lakers' Lamar Odom sits on the bench in the fourth quarter of a Western Conference playoff basketball game against the Phoenix Suns in Phoenix. Odom, who was embraced by teammates and television fans alike for his Everyman approach to fame, was found face-down and alone Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015, after spending four days at the Love Ranch, a legal Nevada brothel. (AP Photo/Ross D. Franklin, File)
Associated Press Oct. 15, 2015 | 2:19 p.m. EDT + More LAS VEGAS (AP) â€” The latest on the hospitalization of Lamar Odom, who was found unconscious Tuesday in a Nevada brothel (all times local):
10:30 a.m.
Khloe Kardashian and the owner of the Love Ranch are sparring over the media frenzy surrounding Lamar Odom, who is hospitalized after being found unconscious at the Nevada brothel.
Both sides say Kardashian's reps reached out to brothel owner Dennis Hof on Wednesday, asking him not to speak to the press.
Hof says he's troubled by the lack of communication from Kardashian. He says he angrily dismissed their request that she do interviews instead of him.
"I know what happened," Hof said. "I'm the one protecting my business and telling the truth about it."
Kardashian's rep says they politely asked Hoff to respect their privacy.
Odom remains hospitalized in Las Vegas after being found unconscious Tuesday at the Crystal, Nevada, brothel.
